palettes.palette_Description: A warm, earthy palette that complements the skin's warm undertones, emphasizes the depth of darker hair, and enhances the richness of brown eyes. This palette is perfect for a classic yet modern look, capturing the essence of autumn.

recommended_colors.description: A rich green that harmonizes with the warm undertones of autumn.
A warm, earthy red-brown that brings out the natural warmth in the skin tone.
A vibrant orange that adds a modern twist to classic autumn tones.

palettes.palette_Description: A cool-toned palette that complements neutral skin tones, light hair, and blue eyes, offering a fresh, wintery aesthetic.

recommended_colors.description: A cool blue that brings out the clarity of blue eyes.
A deep gray that contrasts beautifully with lighter hair.
A cool blonde that accentuates the neutral tones.
